<title level="1" right="Trait">[Mutant](/Traits.aspx?ID=229)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 347</row>

The monster has mutated or evolved, granting it unusual benefits, drawbacks, or both.
